## MapView.getScreenPosition() method

Returns the screen position of the given geo coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getScreenPosition(geoPos: GeoCoordinates): THREE.Vector2 | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  geoPos | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The geo coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

THREE.Vector2 \| undefined

The screen position in CSS/client coordinates (no pixel ratio applied) or `undefined`<!-- -->.
